687314e1ee500b06711955a2 description: When the blockade started and majority of the reserve base personnel abandoned the area, Glukhar and his gang broke into the weapons testing area of the base and stole what they could. Most of the stolen property has been used or destroyed over time. However, my sources say that whatever remnants of what they found is going to be moved from that area soon, as Glukhar and his men are looking to expand their territory.
687314e1ee500b06711955a2 startedMessageT: I need you to go the  3rd floor Armory located in the Black Pawn building and look for what rightfully belongs to the government. Find whatever it is they have left, and bring it back to me. My garrison will be reward for our efforts, which means you will get your own pay day.
687314e1ee500b06711955a2 successMessageT: Great find, glad we got that out of there before it was moved.
